lines.text: Slim, I ain't never seen a handgun that big before.
Yeah, it's a 50 caliber. They used to use it to hunt buffalo with... up close! It's only legal in two states. And this isn't one of them.
You're somthin' else, Slim.
Gosh, I didn't realize it was going to be this formal. If I had known it was going to be this kind of party I would have worn underwear.

Just remember, when you pull the trigger, the bullets come out going very, very fast. So make sure to keep the weapon pointing away from you. Now that's about it. You are now armed... guards. God help us all.
Ooh, they're going to feel that in the morning.
[Norman wants to question the union officials about "mandatory" contributions]
Are you crazy? Look at those guys; I bet any one of them could tell you where Jimmy Hoffa is buried!

[panting]
Listen... I'm only gonna say this once. I'm a special officer. You have to get me to the corner of 83rd and Aviation in 10 minutes... otherwise, two wonderful people that I know are gonna die.
Well, climb on in here, Slim.

[enters the truck's cab]
Whew! Thank you.
Well, let's just see how fast this son-of-a-bitch'll go!
[the psycho Cowboy truck driver starts up the tanker truck and suddenly begins slaming into all the parked cars in the traffic jam!]
Hold on tight to your saddle horn, son!
Pay attention fat boy! It's canine control. You got it?
Daaahhh, I think so.
Don't be a smart ass Dooley!
[Frank and Norman exit the porno bookstore disguised as a transvestite and leather man respectively when they run into the bad cops looking for them; Frank and Norman freeze]
What are you looking at you schmucks?
[Frank and Norman sigh with relief that Rizzo does not recognize them and quickly get into their characters]

[mimicking 'Divine']
Oh, isn't he cute? And look that these muscles.
Take your hands off me! I'm a police officer.

[falsetto voice]
Oh, don't mine him. He gets so frisky every time he sees a badge.
What are you doing later on tonight?
Take a walk you jerks!

[to Frank]
Come on, let's trot.
Why can't you look this good?
Mother Nature wasn't kind to some of us.

[shoves Frank and Norman]
Move it!
Ooo, he touched me! I got my Christmas goose early!
Mr. Kane, you are one of the worst lawyers I've ever known.
Well, then I move for a mistrial.
That's it? Just like that, huh?
Mr. Kane, there are only two things that you have to remember - never fall asleep where anyone can see you and make sure your name is very clearly marked on your lunch.
Well, I can handle that.
[Frank and Norman are hiding in a overheated steam room]
"Let's hide in the steam room." Great plan, Frank! It's a good thing we didn't hide in the barbecue pit because Carlino would have had a sudden craving for ribs!
